attributes.action: Please do not allow the proposed Islamic march through Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is OUR United Kingdom of Great Britain.
I have only set up this page as a protest against what seems to be going to happen in Wootton Bassett. Anybody that has been to Bassett will know that it is a sleepy little town. It's not thier fault that they are on the route that takes our fallen hero's to thier final resting place...........however, this little town comes out in it's 1000's as a mark of respect to our fallen hero's, regardless of race, religion or ethnanticity. Yes I'm making a protest, and I think so should we all. This 'group' that want to march through Bassett are only doing it for publicity and to provoke emotions, well, it's worked. Tell them to go elsewhere, leave Bassett alone.....but no, that won't happen. It's about time, our government earned thier over blown saleries and grew a pair, and stopped this outrage. This is not a racist group, I'm only saying what most people are thinking, and I'm proud to be British!!!!!!! Please Sir, do something as I fear that this could cause riots all over the country, and a lot of inocent people may get hurt. You have the power.

rejection.details: Islam4UK has said it no longer plans to march through Wootton Bassett.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
